member.name: T:FactoryDesignPattern.CardFactory
member.summary: This is the abstract class that will create credit cards.

member.name: T:FactoryDesignPattern.CreditCard
member.summary: This class represents the 'Product' class which is to be generated. This is the main base abstraction that all card types would be created from.

member.name: P:FactoryDesignPattern.CreditCard.CreditLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the credit limit.

member.name: P:FactoryDesignPattern.CreditCard.AnnualCharge
member.summary: Gets or sets the annual charge.

member.name: T:FactoryDesignPattern.MoneyBackCreditCard
member.summary: This class models the money back credit card - a 'ConcreteProduct' class. This class basically is one of the types that can be created.

member.name: T:FactoryDesignPattern.PlatinumCreditCard
member.summary: Another 'ConcreteProduct' class which can be created on its own.

member.name: T:FactoryDesignPattern.Program
member.summary: This is the main driver class.

member.name: M:FactoryDesignPattern.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: This is the main driver method.
